SELECT sfj.id jobid,sfj.shnrid, bp.xxid, bp.bt, bp.btys, bp.xxlx,fn_get_dict(bp.xxlx) xxlxmc, bp.xxnr, bp.create_by,fn_get_username(bp.create_by) create_bymc , DATE_FORMAT(bp.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S') create_date, bp.remarks,fn_get_dict(bp.remarks) ztmc FROM bd_publish bp INNER JOIN v_flow_job sfj ON bp.xxid = sfj.shnrid AND bp.remarks <> '10603' AND sfj.lcmk = '10303' WHERE sfj.yhid = #{shr} order by bp.create_date desc

SELECT fn_get_dict(sfh.shjg) shjg,sfh.shyj,fn_get_username(sfh.shr) shr,DATE_FORMAT(sfh.shsj, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S') shsj, bp.xxid, bp.bt, bp.btys, bp.xxlx,fn_get_dict(bp.xxlx) xxlxmc, bp.xxnr, bp.create_by,fn_get_username(bp.create_by) create_bymc , DATE_FORMAT(bp.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S') create_date, bp.remarks,fn_get_dict(bp.remarks) ztmc FROM bd_publish bp INNER JOIN sd_flow_history sfh ON sfh.shnrid = bp.xxid AND sfh.lcmk = '10303' AND sfh.shr = #{shr}
